title: Caveman hits Giraffe in a Car
description: Slash, survive and get tougher - a wacky action roguelike with hand-drawn graphics and a caveman on the hunt for monsters! Just when you think you've seen it all, here it comes: a giraffe in a car.

title: Pay-to-Win in Mobile-Games
description: In this German video essay, I explore the pay-to-win model in mobile games. I discuss the ethical issues surrounding manipulation and the game mechanics designed to maximize in-game purchases. Additionally, I examine how real-money purchases give players advantages and their impact on the gaming community.

title: Vacation
description: A fictional soft drink ad, brought to life through a dynamic vector animation in After Effects with sound design.

title: Dresden is UNreal
description: A fast-paced journey through Dresden - match cuts, hyperlapses, and vibrant street art blend into a seamless visual flow.

title: Jurassic Park 1993
description: For this project, I took on the challenge of creating my own sound design for iconic scenes from the film. All sounds – from the roaring T-Rex to clattering pots – come from the FreeSounds.org library and were carefully timed to recreate the atmosphere of the original.

title: Pearl Western Style
description: A cinematic fragrance ad, created in a three-day challenge for the fictional project Pearl. Filmed in a retired bank vault.

title: Pearl Hyper Cars
description: A cinematic toy car ad, crafted in a three-day challenge for the fictional project PEAL. Inspired by over-the-top childhood toy commercials, it’s a high-energy ride—dramatic, fast-paced, and just a little too epic for a tiny car.

title: Photo Editing
description: I enjoy editing photos in Adobe Lightroom. Check out my profile for more!
